application_type_full: Prior Approval: Change of use - offices to dwellinghouses
description: Change of use of ground, first, second, third, fourth and fifth floors from Class B1(a) office to Class C3 dwellinghouses to form 65 one bedroom and 10 two bedroom flats (56 day application for prior approval in respect of transport, contamination and flooding risks under Class J Part 3 of the GPDO)
